Question: This person, along with his brother Eli, volunteered their assistance in the wake of Hurricane Katrina.
Hints: This person was named AFC Offensive Player of the Month for the fourth time in his career in September.
This person won AFC Offensive Player of the Week for the 2nd time this season (18th time, career).
After a May 23 neck surgery, this person could not use the Colts' facilities for practice and workouts due to the NFL lockout.
